Interface FieldWriter<FieldType>

    public interface FieldWriter<FieldType>
extends java.util.function.Function<FieldType,byte[]>
    This interface serializes a field's value into a byte array

    • Method Summary

      default byte[] apply(FieldType fieldValue) 
      byte[] writeField(FieldType fieldValue)
      Serializes the entry into binary data that will be stored as the value for the row
